title: Ping Issues
body:
A majority of my games recently have been experiencing higher than average ping problems. Here's a photo of just one Reader Log example http://imgur.com/a/dWxMu And that's not even the worst of it, I was unable to find the game where my ping reached heights of 3k. It's beginning to make supporting in high graphics teamfights a lot more difficult and I'm not a fan.

 I've even used the Hextech repair tool recently (for unrelated reasons, but it was used). I'm playing on a Mac laptop, so I know I'm not on the highest standard of gaming device but I used to be able to hover at around at least 75, 80 ping consistently. I'd love it if I could get it to 30 some day, but that's dreaming a little big considering I live so far from the NA server. #WestCoastProbs 

Anyways, any help would be much appreciated.

replies.body: Holy moly that packet lot is pretty extreme!  Being in the west coast should not do this, but a degrading connection can.  As far as network issues go, the HRT can help with auto-configuring firewall settings.  To help rule out possibilities or fix things up completely, you'll instead want to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  Test it out in a custom, and let me know how it goes.
